Reason: The configuration 'column_index_cache_size_in_kb' is performance-sensitive. The code context shows that this configuration directly affects the size limit for sstable indexed key cache entries held on heap, impacting memory usage and potentially system performance. Setting the cache size limit too low may result in more index entries being read from disk, while setting it too high may lead to increased memory usage. This configuration involves memory-expensive operations and can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
